clinical_note: MRI Brain with contrast: 55-year-old male with glioblastoma. Status post resection and radiation therapy 6 months ago. Currently on Avastin. Findings show decreased enhancement compared to prior study. FLAIR signal remains stable. No new lesions.

Follow-up MRI: Patient with anaplastic astrocytoma. Post-radiation changes noted. Increasing FLAIR hyperintensity in the treatment field. Enhancement has increased by approximately 30%. Clinical correlation recommended for pseudoprogression versus true progression.
